synopsis.text:
Mika and Koko, two seemingly ordinary celebrities, lead a thrilling double life as secret agents in this computer-animated gag anime produced by Production I.G. With their captivating looks and dynamic personalities, they charm the public on TV dramas and beach vacations, but behind the scenes, they're on a mission to discipline the wicked men of the world.

Koko, a skilled markswoman, and Mika, a martial artist with a bear-fisted punch, transform into the Abunai Sisters when duty calls, leaving their unsuspecting film crew in the dust. Their secret, anonymous boss always finds the perfect time to interrupt their day jobs, leading to hilarious and action-packed escapades.

Based on the real-life Kano Sisters, the anime character designs are created by Susumu Matsushita, known for his work on the Orix Buffalos baseball team mascot. The sisters' unique abilities, such as breasts that vibrate when danger is near or inflate to serve as airbags, add a comedic twist to their adventures.

As the Abunai Sisters, Mika and Koko are determined to punish diabolical men with their sexy action and often funny personalities. Will they be able to balance their careers as actresses and secret agents? Tune in to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
